changes: Changed the timing update tick from half a second to two tenths of a second.
Modified AnnouncerWorker and AnnouncerWindow to ignore exceptions in places.
Timing systems are now sorted when the Timing Page is loaded.
Modified the code that added blank timing systems when every slot was full of known systems.
Added Sentry integration to allow for automatic uploads of crash reports.
Added error logging and crash reporting to the files in the logs folder found next to the SQLite database.
fixes: Fixed an issue where the Announcer Window would have an identity crisis if a remote announcer was set.
